issue.title: <frame/>: Support multiple frames in a single parent? Intended scope of frames? Use link names as frames?

content.raw:
Given that this has merged into SDFormat 1.7, I'm marking this as closed.

See SDFormat Changelog for 9.x: [#!/osrf/sdformat/src/a9f07a067fcc6a4702a5ae2192cc647e2f809ec0/Changelog.md?at=default](#!/osrf/sdformat/src/a9f07a067fcc6a4702a5ae2192cc647e2f809ec0/Changelog.md?at=default)
